$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/gis.title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/giscus-config
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/gis.text:
\whitespace trim \define tid() $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/config \define tidFilter() $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/filter You may have to save and reload the wiki to activate changes. * Install giscus for your github repo [[Install Giscus|https://github.com/apps/giscus/installations/new]] * [[get giscus parameter|https://giscus.app/zh-CN]]
filter: <$edit-text tiddler=<> placeholder="[!is[system]]" tag="input" default="" /> <$button> Reset filter <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>>/>

$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/gis.title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/giscus-pagecontrol
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/gis.text:
\whitespace trim

\define tid() Comment Area
<$button tooltip="Message Here" aria-label="Message Here" class=<<tv-config-toolbar-class>> set="$:/state/oeyoews/github-giscus-comments" setTo=<<tid>> >
  {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/icon}}
  <$action-navigate $to=<<tid>>/>
</$button>

$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/sty.title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/style
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/sty.text:
<!-- hide powered -->
.gsc-left-header {
    display: none !important;
}

#__next .text-sm {
    font-size: .875rem;
    line-height: 1.25rem;
		color: red !important;
}

$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/vie.title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/viewtemplate
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/vie.text: <$list filter="[all[current]!is[system]!is[draft]subfilter{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/filter}]" variable="comment"> <$list filter="[[$:/language]get[text]removeprefix[$:/languages/]else[en-GB]]" variable="lang"> <$set name="stateTiddler" value="$:/state/oeyoews/github-giscus-comments"> <$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text=<>> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" set=<> setTo=<> > {{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/icon}} <$list filter="[!search[zh]]"> Show Comments <$list filter="[search[zh]]"> æ˜¾ç¤ºè¯„è®º <$reveal type="match" state=<> text=<>> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" set=<> setTo=""> {{$:/core/images/up-arrow}} {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/icon}} <$list filter="[!search[zh]]"> Fold Comments <$list filter="[search[zh]]"> æ”¶èµ·è¯„è®º <$giscus id=<> lang="en" theme="light"/>

/home/oeyoews/REPOS/neotw/dev/plugins/ti.title: /home/oeyoews/REPOS/neotw/dev/plugins/tiddlywiki-giscus/tiddlers/viewtoolbar.tid
/home/oeyoews/REPOS/neotw/dev/plugins/ti.text: \whitespace trim <$list filter="[all[current]!is[draft]subfilter{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/filter}]" variable="comment"> <$button tooltip="View Giscus comments" aria-label="giscus comments" class=<> set="$:/state/oeyoews/github-giscus-comments" setTo=<> > <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/icon}} <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> <$text text=" "/> <$text text="view GitHub comments"/>
